price: Odoo feenee magaalota hunda keessatti akeekkachiisaa ni ergina ture.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
